text: Matt Maiellaro is the co-creator and writer of the cult television animated Adult Swim shows Aqua Teen Hunger Force and Perfect Hair Forever. He is also the creator of 12 Oz. Mouse. Maiellaro was a producer and writer for Space Ghost Coast to Coast since the show started in 1994. ==Filmography== Year(s) Production Role(s) Other notes 1990 Darkman Set production assistant 1992 Basket Case 3: The Progeny Second assistant director 1992 Hellraiser III: Hell on Earth First assistant director - second unit 1993 Ruby in Paradise Second assistant director 1994 Ring of Steel Second assistant director 1994–2004 Space Ghost Coast to Ghost Producer, Writer 2000 Brak Presents the Brak Show Starring Brak Producer, Writer Two variety show specials 2000–2015 Aqua Teen Hunger Force Co-Creator, Writer, Director, Producer, Actor 2001 Sealab 2021 Writer 2004–2005 Perfect Hair Forever Writer 2004 Spacecataz Co-Creator, Writer, Director, Producer, Actor Failed pilot 2005–2007; returning in 2020 12 oz. Mouse Creator, Director, Writer, Actor 2007 Aqua Teen Hunger Force Colon Movie Film for Theaters Writer, Director, Producer, Actor ==Related pages== * Dave Willis Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:American voice actors Category:Aqua Teen Hunger Force Category:People from Pensacola, Florida
